reviews.name: Troy Windhorst
reviews.comment: Small green space in the midst of the concrete jungle this is downtown Dallas. Essentially a spot to take a break, with nothing spectacular, there are enough interesting features to please the eyes. +4

reviews.name: J
reviews.comment: The architecture is unique and nice, but the homeless here are so hostile. We're just taking pictures and he harasses us saying he doesn't want him to be in the picture. Instead of enjoying the place we just left.  Don't come here.

reviews.name: Margot B
reviews.comment: It was excellent. The No Kings Protest was violent free and excellent as well +3

reviews.name: Freddy Govantes
reviews.comment: Went for No Kings Rally. Great turn out and super easy to get to.

reviews.name: Bruce InCharlotte
reviews.comment:
There was some sort of event being set up today (eclipse?) so I didn't get to explore Pacific Plaza as much as I would have liked. I could still walk around a bit. This lovely open and green space is airy and fresh and while there isn't a buffer for noise, it was still calmer and more peaceful than most.

The park has some swings and play space for the little ones. A small low fence around it would be helpful.PlaygroundThere are some play areas here.RestroomsI did not see any public restrooms.Dog-friendlinessLeashed dogs are permitted.Picnic areaThere is some seating here.

reviews.name: Lavette Dameron
reviews.comment: Dallas Soul Flower Music Fest! Great times and great vibes! ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.name: Samuel Reed
reviews.comment: The place offered a peaceful break from city noise. The air was clean, and the environment felt safe. It was nice to see people respecting the space and keeping it neat.

reviews.name: Dena Sims
reviews.comment: Great vista in this downtown park. It appears to be in a courtyard surrounded by tall buildings. It‚Äôs a place to sit under many shade trees and people watch as the walk through the park. Sometimes I spot people playing soccer, football and frisbee.  The grass in this park is green and inviting +9

reviews.name: Caden Alexander
reviews.comment: It's a nice park for walking dogs, but it's usually accompanied by a few homeless individuals.

reviews.name: R4F4
reviews.comment:
What to say about the Pacific Plaza?

What a great place to sit down and relax, lay on the grass or grab and table and eat during lunch break. It also has a small playground with seesaws.seesaw.

I highly recommend it!Picnic areaMany tables and seats.

reviews.name: Jason Russell
reviews.comment: Great little peaceful place right in the middle of downtown Dallas. Stop by here to have lunch while you're in the city really nice place. Lots of activities to do with your kids putting a of places just to sit and hang out. You should go check it out really nice +11

reviews.name: Kenia L
reviews.comment: I wasn't expecting much, but it was quite nice, I'll definitely go back another time to hang out, it's comfortable, you can eat your food right there, and it's very nice to look around.

reviews.name: Perri-A Perri-A
reviews.comment: Sooo beautiful at night +24

Familiar setting!

Great to see so many people coming, It was fun and peaceful üá∫üá∏üíó

reviews.name: Sam Towns
reviews.comment: This was a nice park and playground in walking distance from our hotel. The landscaping is beautiful and the building views set a nice scene. We had fun on a Sunday morning with our kids. The only thing was there was a large group of homeless people (30+) sleeping in one corner of the park which was a bit weird. It seems the city has a major homeless problem as we encountered them everywhere we went downtown.

reviews.name: Anand Arya
reviews.comment: Wonderful park and great views of the city. Small kids play area. Homeless people around it.

reviews.name: Sara Boyer
reviews.comment: Lovely park! My Husband and I had fun walking around and exploring the area! It is a calming place to escape the hustle and bustle of the city!

reviews.name: Maritza Ortega
reviews.comment: Fabulous addition to Downtown Dallas! A green space in the heart of Dallas with beautiful views of the city buildings! The best views happen at sunset!! +24

reviews.name: Madison Rainbow
reviews.comment: This gorgeous 3.4 acre park opens October 14, 2019! +43

reviews.name: Dezirae Rae
reviews.comment: I love this park. Its so open and beautiful! Our dogs love it. The park is pretty clean.

reviews.name: Lonnie Wright
reviews.comment: We went to the no Kings protest number 2 there it was nice it rained that day quite hard for a little while

reviews.name: Aleisha Rutherford
reviews.comment: No shade on playground. Nice area but not suitable for children during the day when it‚Äôs hot out.

reviews.name: Judith Rojo-Gaxiola
reviews.comment: Great Park to relax in Down Town, pet friendly, very enjoyable +32

reviews.name: Tasnim Ara Islam
reviews.comment: The 3.7 acre Pacific Plaza is a public park in Downtown Dallas.  This urban oaisis provides a grassy respite amongst the oversized downtown buildings. The park offers multi-purpose central lawn, playgrounds, etc. The park‚Äôs 95-by-138-foot pavilion has a steel panel pierced with the morse code signature of every local stop along the Texas and Pacific Railroad between New Orleans and El Paso. That is really impressive.

reviews.name: Shayer S
reviews.comment: Nice little green space near the hotels. Enough space to let the kids run around under watchful eyes and not be worried about traffic.

reviews.name: Steve D
reviews.comment: Beautiful architecture in Dallas downtown, so much of open space.

reviews.name: Javier Olivarez
reviews.comment: Puptopia was held here and Dexter really enjoyed himself! Hope more events are held at this plaza!

reviews.name: Yo Passion
reviews.comment:
Nice swings , places to sit with table and chairs also good trails and pretty Xmas lights already .. i usually come down here and swing and look at the high-rises. It‚Äôs very nice.
one of my favorite parks in Dallas.
